name: Parkour, dude
description:
You have to parkour through the city rooftops while collecting coins and timers to up your time and score! Try to fill up the whole leader board!

(I could not figure out animations so there are none.)

W,space,up arrow to jump

D,right arrow to go right

A,left arrow to go left

Shift to sprint

ENTER to start and click stuff

this was made for the scorespace jam #19

leave feedback in the comments.

all art,music,code and sound was made by me.
